com.stefanbrenner.droplet.model
Interface IDroplet

All Superinterfaces:
INotificationSupport
All Known Implementing Classes:
Droplet
public interface IDroplet
extends INotificationSupport

Interface for the base droplet object that contains all devices.

Author:
Stefan Brenner
